name: green mushrooms
description: They are dark green, with tall brown stems.

name: black ant
description: A large black ant.

name: white rat
description: It looks like a cute lab rat, but it has sharp teeth.

name: brown beetle
description: It is a giant brown beetle with a hard exoskeleton.

name: crawling moss
description: A mass of sickly green vegetation. It’s crawling around slowly.

name: giant salamander
description: A giant green salamander. Watch out!

name: bit
description: A small creature that looks like a red gumdrop.

name: bot
description: A small creature that looks like a blue gumdrop.

name: yellow ant
description: A large yellow ant; it is about 2 feet long.

name: pigeon
description: An ill-tempered pigeon.

name: yellow snake
description: It is about 6 feet long and covered in bright yellow and gold scales.

name: scruffy dog
description: A thin flea-ridden mutt, growling as you get close.

name: yellow mushrooms
description: Some brownish mushrooms; they look like shiitakes.

name: floating eye
description: A disembodied eye, floating a few feet above the ground.

name: bat
description: A gray bat, fluttering around the air.

name: green worm mass
description: It is a large slimy mass of green worms.

name: brown imp
description: A fast, mischievous creature.

name: green kimodo
description: A giant Komodo dragon. It is about 10 feet long and has a venomous bite.

name: purple spider
description: A large and powerful amathyst spider with bright yellow eyes.

name: novice mage
description: He is fumbling with his spell books.

name: novice warrior
description: An inexperienced but tough warrior.

name: novice archer
description: He just completed archery training.

name: novice rogue
description: A shifty individual.

name: red ant
description: A fire ant, about 3 feet long, with burning pincers.

name: cobra
description: A large snake with a hooded face, coiling as you approach.

name: green centipede
description: It is 4 feet long and carnivorous.

name: pincer beetle
description: It is a giant brown beetle that clicks its mandibles in anticipation of prey.

name: dust devil
description: A whirling vortex of sand - watch out if you’re wearing contacts!

name: jackal
description: It is a yapping snarling dog, dangerous when in a pack.

name: brown scorpion
description: It is a large scorpion with a sharp stinger.

name: blue ooze
description: It’s blue and it’s oozing.

name: great turtle
description: A thunderous and ancient tortoise, with a strong carapace and surprising agility.

name: minotaur
description: A cross between a human and a bull. He has the skulls of other adventurers around his belt.

name: rabbit mage
description: This rabbit humanoid is a sly magician.

name: rabbit warrior
description: It is a rabbit humanoid versed in the art of war.

name: rabbit archer
description: It is a rabbit humanoid ready with bow and arrows.

name: rabbit rogue
description: A rabbit humanoid that eyes your purse. He has a sharp dagger.

name: purple beetle
description: A purple beetle caustic bite and hard carapace.

name: blue snake
description: A huge 12-foot python, covered in an intricate blue scales.

name: black spider
description: A giant tarantula with large hairy legs and glowing red ees.

name: green imp
description: A mischievous creature.

name: small red spiny
description: An unusual lizard with a horn, covered with sharp spines.

name: rock lizard
description: A lizard with a hardened hide.

name: yellow worm mass
description: It is a large slimy mass of green worms.

name: yellow schweinhund
description: A yellow schweinhund with sharp fangs and a long tail.

name: Balthazar the Great
description: Balthazar is one of the world’s greatest kobold swordsmen, known for his feats at the battle of Arignor.

name: dark elf mage
description: A dark elven figure, dressed all in black, hurling spells at you.

name: dark elf warrior
description: A dark elven figure in armour and ready with his sword.

name: dark elf archer
description: A dark elven figure armed with a longbow.

name: dark elf rogue
description: A dark elven figure armed with a short sword, ready to slit your throat.

name: baby blue dragon
description: Its still-tender scales are deep blue in hue. Icy blasts of cold air come from it as it breathes.

name: baby yellow dragon
description: Its still-tender scales are deep yellow in hue. Acid drips from its claws.

name: blue beetle
description: It is a giant beetle with vicious ice-cold claws.

name: gray wolf
description: It is a large wolf with eyes full of cunning.

name: bear
description: A large bear appears to have made its home in this cave. It is hungry, and you are trespassing in its territory.

name: white wolf
description: A large and muscled wolf from the northern wastes. Its breath is cold and icy and its fur coated in frost.

name: big red spiny
description: A great lizard with a horn, sharp spines, and a spiked tail.

name: frost giant
description: A twelve foot tall giant covered in furs.

name: Hagar the Merciless
description: Hagar, warrior-king from the East, is legendary for his skill in combat and excessive cruelty.

name: ice creature
description: It is a towering glacier of ice, moving inexorably towards you.

name: orc mage
description: An orc dressed in skins who gestures wildly.

name: orc warrior
description: An armoured orc with an air of authority.

name: orc archer
description: An orc archer who moves with confidence.

name: orc rogue
description: A cunning and devious orc with a chaotic nature.

name: baby green dragon
description: Its still-tender scales are deep green in hue. Poison seeps through its scales.

name: baby red dragon
description: Its still-tender scales are deep red in hue. Heat radiates from its form.

name: gold dragonfly
description: Large beating wings support this dazzling insect.

name: purple worms
description: It is a large slimy mass of purple worms.

name: golem
description: It is a massive animated statue.

name: griffin
description: A legendary creature with the body, and back legs of a lion and the head and wings of an eagle.

name: chess knight
description: This strange creature always moves in the shape of an L, jumping over obstacles.

name: copperhead snake
description: It has a copper head and sharp venomous fangs.

name: Lor the Betrayer
description: Lor, heir to the throne of Undor, killed his father and betrayed his kingdom for his lust for gold.

name: basilisk
description: A vile reptile that preys on unsuspecting travellers. Its eyes stare deeply at you and your soul starts to wilt!

name: skeleton mage
description: A skeleton mage. Power seems to crackle from his frame.

name: skeleton warrior
description: A skeleton warrior of considerable skill.

name: skeleton archer
description: A skeleton archer wielding arrows tipped with rusty iron.

name: skeleton rogue
description: A skeleton rogue. He moves stealthily and his eyes gleam with evil intent.

name: mummy
description: It is a human form encased in mouldy wrappings.

name: blue ghost
description: A figure that seems made of void. Its strangely human shape is cloaked in shadow.

name: pink ghost
description: It is a ghostly form with eyes that haunt you, and a shriek that pierces to your bones.

name: vampire
description: It is a humanoid with an aura of power. You notice a sharp set of front teeth.

name: evil eye
description: A globular body with a large toothy mouth, a large central eye, and three smaller eyes on stalks protruding from the top of its body.

name: floating skull
description: A glowing skull possessed by sorcerous power. It need not move, but merely blast you with mighty magic as it speaks the words of power.

name: vampire bat
description: A blood-sucking bat that flies at your neck hungrily.

name: red spider
description: It is a vast red spider whose bulbous body is bloated with poison. Cunning and evil, it seeks to taste your juicy insides.

name: skeletal dragon
description: The skeletal form of a once-great dragon, enchanted by magic most perilous. Its animated form strikes with speed and wrath.

name: troll mage
description: A stout troll who is adept at hurling spells as easily as crunching your bones.

name: troll warrior
description: This troll's great strength and size make it a fearsome foe.

name: troll archer
description: A powerful troll versed in the art of archery.

name: troll rogue
description: A tall, thin troll who blends into the shadows before attacking viciously.

name: blue dragon
description: A huge draconic form. Frost covers it from head to tail, and its wintry breath chills you to the bone.

name: yellow dragon
description: A huge draconic form. Pools of acid melt the floor around it.

name: red komodo
description: A giant Komodo dragon. It has a nearly impenetrable hide of a deep red hue.

name: giant roc
description: A vast legendary bird, its iron talons rake the most impenetrable of surfaces and its screech echoes through the many winding dungeon corridors.

name: zombie
description: A humanoid form encased in mouldy wrappings, the result of some unspeakable spell that left him wandering the earth forever.

name: red cobra
description: A great cobra with ruby scales.

name: sandworm
description: An enormous worm with a fearsome array of crystalline teeth.

name: two headed ogre
description: A giant orc-like figure with a two heads and an awesomely muscled frame. It regrows it heads as fast as you chop them off.

name: oliphant
description: A giant elephantine creature with four tusks, sharp teeth, and a foul temper.

name: demon mage
description: A fearsome opponent. His spells are lethal and his combat blows crushingly hard.

name: demon warrior
description: A demon wielding a massive sword. Feared by all when it flies into one of its berserk rages, it will cut down anything in its path.

name: demon archer
description: A demon wielding a deadly bow which he fires with deadly efficiency.

name: demon rogue
description: His eyes gleam with malice as he waits for unsuspecting travelers.

name: green dragon
description: A huge draconic form enveloped in clouds of poisonous vapour.

name: red dragon
description: A huge draconic form. Wisps of smoke steam from its nostrils and the extreme heat surrounding it makes you gasp for breath.

name: creeping magma
description: A pulsing jelly as hot as magma that flows toward you, leaving a path of destruction.

name: lava beetle
description: This beetle can tunnel through solid rock with its pincers, and cut through your armor like butter.

name: mumak
description: A massive elephantine form with eyes twisted by madness.

name: iron golem
description: It is a massive metal statue that moves steadily towards you

name: fire vortex
description: A towering fire vortex, burning everything beyond recognition.

name: lava dragon
description: An immense dragon capable of awesome destruction that dwells within pools of lava. Fire leaps continuously from its huge form. You have never felt such extreme heat, or witnessed such a scorching stare.

name: phoenix
description: A massive glowing eagle bathed in flames. The searing heat chars your skin and melts your armour.

name: Maeglor
description: Lord of the underworld, Maeglor is a massive humanoid demon wreathed in flames. His power and evil are undeniable - darkness itself recoils from his touch as he leaves a trail of death and destruction. Mighty claws rend reality as he annihilates all in his path to your soul!

name: alien mage
description: A great mage, incanting horribly as he advances toward you. Power seems to crackle from his slender frame.

name: alien warrior
description: A mighty warrior wearing armour and radiating evil power. He moves with lightning speed.

name: alien archer
description: A legendary archer who fires arrows with terrifying speed and accuracy.

name: alien rogue
description: A master of camouflage, this thief has great power and shifty speed.

name: ancient black dragon
description: A massive dragon, one of the mightiest of dragonkind. It is thousands of years old and seeks to maintain the Cosmic Balance. It will destroy you.

name: ancient gold dragon
description: A huge draconic form wreathed in a nimbus of light. Its roar stuns and deafens you.

name: master vampire
description: A terrible robed undead figure, this creature has existed in its unlife for many centuries by stealing the life of others.

name: beholder
description: A beholder of great size and age, floating in the air. His gaze seems to shred your soul and his spells crush your will.

name: magic whirlwind
description: An awesome vortex of pure magic that twists and tears at the fabric of space.

name: djinn
description: Free from his lamp, this creature uses his powerful magics to exact revenge upon the world for his entrapment.

name: spike dog
description: A great hound with spines along his back. He growls as you enter his territory, then ferociously lashes his spiked tail.

name: Lugorith
description: The lord of chaos, Lugorith is a massive dragon of changing form. As you watch, it appears first fair and then foul. Its body is twisted by chaotic forces as it strives to stay real. Its very existence distorts the universe around it.

name: evil incarnate
description: A massive form cloaked in flame. His skeletal visage is twisted with evil, as he seeks forever to dominate all that is light and good in the world. He is the origin of man's fear of darkness and has created many foul creatures with his evil powers. He holds a great staff in his hand, and strides forward to destroy you.

name: goldfish
description: It looks just like the goldfish you used to keep in a glass bowl when you were a kid, but bigger.

name: green fish
description: Barracuda, known for their large size, fearsome appearance and ferocious behaviour.

name: eel
description: An electric eel slipping through the water.

name: pink jellyfish
description: A large pink jellyfish. It looks poisonous.

name: copper jellyfish
description: A copper-colored jellyfish; it has a large bell and long tentacles.

name: scaryfish
description: This fish has long teeth and spiky fins that look like a mohawk.

name: water whirlwind
description: A towering water elemental, sending wave after wave toward your frail body.

name: octopus
description: A primeval creature with tentacles 20 feet long.

name: medusa
description: A hideous gorgon, with venom dripping from her ghastly mouth.

name: sea dragon
description: A mighty sea dragon, with great horns and a long tail.

name: yellow turtle
description: A turtle with a yellow shell.

name: red turtle
description: A turtle with a red shell.
